name: Ext_R5_OrganizationAffiliation_contact
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.OrganizationAffiliation.contact for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents OrganizationAffiliation.contact from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/OrganizationAffiliation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Official contact details at the participatingOrganization relevant to this Affiliation
element.definition: The contact details of communication devices available at the participatingOrganization relevant to this Affiliation.
element.comment: `OrganizationAffiliation.contact` maps to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.telecom`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
`OrganizationAffiliation.contact` maps to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.telecom`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
`OrganizationAffiliation.contact` maps to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.telecom`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The purpose for which an extended contact detail should be used.

element.short: Name of an individual to contact
element.definition: The name of an individual to contact, some types of contact detail are usually blank.

element.short: This contact detail is handled/monitored by a specific organization
element.definition: This contact detail is handled/monitored by a specific organization. If the name is provided in the contact, then it is referring to the named individual within this organization.
element.comment: `OrganizationAffiliation.contact` maps to R4B `OrganizationAffiliation.telecom`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
